extendedInfo.description: AVP: Evolution is a finalist in the 2013 Mobile Excellence Awards âBest Mobile Gameâ category!The deadliest creatures in the universe face off for the first time on your phone and tablet. Play as both the Alien and Predator in this official game brought to you by Angry Mob Games, the creators of PREDATORSâ¢, Guerrilla Bob and Muffin Knight. On a distant planet, the blood feud between Predator clans continues to rage. In a final attempt to eradicate the Jungle Hunter Clan, the Super Predators secure the capabilities of an unlikely and unwilling species, the Aliens. As an Alien, you must ultimately destroy the Super Predators and free your species from enslavement. As a Jungle Hunter Predator, you must eliminate the Alien Queen in order to prevent the Super Predators from annihilating your clan. VICIOUS CHARACTERS & FIERCE COMBAT *Two distinct gaming experiences as you engage in the ultimate battle as both the Alien and Predator *Vicious attacks and brutal finishing moves give players a lethal arsenal to wreak havoc on the enemy CREATE YOUR OWN ULTIMATE KILLING MACHINE *Engineer your own unique Alien and Predator via character upgrades, enhanced abilities, and a multitude of powerful armor and weapons *Gain the advantage in battle with Facehugger Calls, Rage Rechargers, Net Guns, Proximity Mines, Thermal Vision, Alien Vision, Plasma Cannons and much more CHILLING ENVIRONMENTS *Itâs kill or be killed as you advance through the Temple Arena, Marine Base, Alien Hive and many other eerie settings INCREDIBLE GRAPHICS UNLEASHED *Rich detail, impressive character models and distinctive lightingOptimized for MOGA controllers!

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Great game. Worth the money for sure. Just wish it had some type of arena mode so I can use the character I built up. Replaying the game gets a little stale. Otherwise awesome.
reviews.author: james geronimo

reviews.title: Have always been a fan of the series
reviews.comment: While every game having this franchise title has not been good this game is absolutely fantastic!  Great game play but I\'d rather not use the controller since I don\'t think it meant for everything you have but I\'ve beaten the game a continued to play just to keep upgrading the alien and predator characters so there is a high replay value especially if your not just buying points.... but great game 100%
reviews.author: Sharrief Lentz

reviews.title: Incredible gamevalue
reviews.comment: Excellent game with fairly good controlls. Amazing graphics that run at perfect framerates on my HTC One
reviews.author: Jesper Lekland

reviews.title: An Android gamer must have!
reviews.comment: This game is better than any of the AvP games that have been released in recent years. If you want a satisfying action game with RPG elements and a ton of replayability... look no further.
reviews.author: Douglas Burpee

reviews.title: Great! True to the movie!
reviews.comment: This game is superb!  True to keeping the attributes of rack of the aliens species! The game physics are great and very easy to understand. Must play!
reviews.author: Mikhail Yadav

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Might be the most dependable app I have lol. It always works great and it is a surprisingly high quality game!  Very fun, best predator game I\'ve played since concrete jungle on ps2
reviews.author: Chris Holo

reviews.title: HTC 1 X
reviews.comment: Very Cool game  Good graphics  Wicked  Enjoying both characters Cool would recommend *****
reviews.author: Ryan Hambrey

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Awesome simply an awesome game. Love u guys veeeery much.
reviews.author: Richard Bang

reviews.title: Still unfixed...........
reviews.comment: The graphics on my Samsung galaxy S4 (GT-I9500) isn\'t stable the screen keeps shaking & I can\'t do the attacks very well, otherwise the game is super great. (Fix it & take 5 stars)
reviews.author: Sofian Al-Shooshi

reviews.title: Good game :-)
reviews.comment: Good game, graphics and action BUT needs cloud save as lost all data when changing phones!
reviews.author: Richard Ellis

reviews.title: Best game out there
reviews.comment: Out of all the games that I have played, this one is by far the best. HTC One, runs the game like the YouTube video, no joke. I wish that the credits were a little less expensive but other than that, it\'s a 10/10 game.
reviews.author: William White

reviews.title: The truth
reviews.comment: I love this game.  Worth buying. Just waiting for any dlc or updates. It would be nice to have a multiplayer implemented. Game can be challenging which is fun. Being a hunter is my type of game. Love it
reviews.author: Kevin Urquhart

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Looks awesome on nexus 7 tegra3 one .controls a bit funky but fun well Worth the cash
reviews.author: Ann Carrube

reviews.title: Truly excellent game!
reviews.comment: Loads fast, easy and fun to play, interesting levels...great example of how to make a great mobile game!
reviews.author: Patrick Spadaccino

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: just so fun and cool, i enjoy this game
reviews.author: Igmacio Ramirez

reviews.title: This is a good game. Simple as
reviews.comment: Great hack and slash game. Great items and levels. On the same style as the original and series for pc
reviews.author: Kyle Richmond

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: For an AVP fan, this game truly delivers. Love this game, beautiful graphics and great sounds. Keep it up!!
reviews.author: Sam Wang

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Incredible well made game love it
reviews.author: Reinar Rre

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Brilliant graphics for a phone, no glitches, and so good not to have ads or repeatedly being asked to spend more money! Overall a brilliant game, highly recommend it.
reviews.author: alesha sethia

reviews.title: Good game!
reviews.comment: This is a amazing game and now for 1 dollar! This is just great also the graphic are awsome on the galaxy s4
reviews.author: Cristin Feliz
